title: Grateful Dead Live at Radio City Music Hall on 1980-10-27
lineage: MAC > Nakamichi CR-5A > Edirol FA-66 > Wavelab > R8Brain > CD-Wave > TLH > FLAC 1644 tagged. Transfer by Andrew F. 09/2011
source: flac16: AUD: 2x Nakamichi CM300/CP1 cardioids > Nakamichi 550 > Maxell UDXLII. Set up in second mezzanine front row, mics hand-held by Tim Friend, recording by Joe Morrone.
